tool_description: Maintains detailed logs of all participant communications across channels, preventing over-communication and providing communication analytics.
error_messages: Invalid participant_id: Participant ID must be a non-empty string.
Unsupported communication_type: Supported types are [invitation, reminder, follow_up, thank_you].
Unsupported channel: Supported channels are [email, sms, push_notification, phone_call].
Invalid timestamp: Must be a valid datetime in ISO 8601 format.
Unsupported status: Supported statuses are [sent, delivered, failed, opened, clicked].
Database error: Unable to store communication record.
usage: Provide participant_id, communication_type, channel, timestamp, and status for each communication event. Optionally include survey_id. Returns confirmation and communication summary.

record_id.description: Unique identifier for the communication record

communication_frequency.description: Average communications per day for this participant
